articles.title: China bans exports to US of gallium, germanium, antimony in response to chip sanctions - The Associated Press
articles.description: China has announced a ban on exports to the United States of gallium, germanium and other key high-tech materials with potential military applications. The Chinese Commerce Ministry announced the move after the Washington expanded its list of Chinese companie…
articles.content: BANGKOK (AP) China announced Tuesday it is banning exports to the United States of gallium, germanium, antimony and other key high-tech materials with potential military applications, as a general pr… [+5063 chars]

articles.author: Elizabeth Rayne
articles.title: Researchers finally identify the ocean’s “mystery mollusk” - Ars Technica
articles.description: It’s a nudibranch, but so distantly related that it gets its own phylogenetic family.
